argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- <. <. + , x. >. , abs >. = <. <. + , x. >. , abs >. |
| 2 | 1 | #P_cnnv | |- <. <. + , x. >. , abs >. e. NrmCVec |
| 3 | 1 | #P_cnnvba | |- CC = ( BaseSet ` <. <. + , x. >. , abs >. ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_cnnvg | |- + = ( +v ` <. <. + , x. >. , abs >. ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_nvass | |- ( ( <. <. + , x. >. , abs >. e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. CC ) ) -> ( ( A + B ) + C ) = ( A + ( B + C ) ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_mpan | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( A + B ) + C ) = ( A + ( B + C ) ) ) |
\
 Derive the associative law for complex number addition ~ addass to demonstrate the use of ~ cnnv , ~ cnnvg , and ~ cnnvba .  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
